name: tm46
effect: Teaches Thief to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Thief to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Psywave)

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user attacks and steals the foe’s held item simultaneously. It can’t steal if the user holds an item.
flavor_text.platinum: The user attacks and steals the foe’s held item simultaneously. It can’t steal if the user holds an item.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user attacks and steals the foe’s held item simultaneously. It can’t steal if the user holds an item.
